Trade/Device Name(s): FaStep Marijuana Tests (Strip, Panel Dip, Quick Cup, Turn-Key Split Cup)
FaStep Methamphetamine Tests (Strip, Panel Dip, Quick Cup, Turn-Key Split Cup)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for FaStep Marijuana and Methamphetamine rapid lateral flow urine drug tests in multiple device formats for qualitative detection
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of 11-nor-Δ9-THC-9-COOH (marijuana metabolite) and methamphetamine in human urine at specified cut-off concentrations; intended for in vitro diagnostic use, for over-the-counter and prescription use
